data.name: Pounce Cat
data.detailed_description:
This precision platformer will put your skills and patience to the test.
Pounce Cat may seem cute on the surface, but ahead lies a challenge, are you good enough to take it on?

Gameplay:
-You are your own worst enemy!
Take your time and think about your actions. A small mistake could cost you.

-Had enough for one day? Your progress is saved on quitting.

Movement:
-Charge your jump to pounce higher, but be careful not to fall. (Comes with cat bum wiggle animation while charging)

-Once you're in the air there's no turning back. You'll either land safely or with a thud. There is no in-between.

Atmosphere:
A fantasy style, pixel world complete with a rather cute cat.

Do you have the skills and patience to make it to the top?

data.short_description: Pounce your way to the top in this high-stakes precision platformer. Try to keep your cool and claw your way up, but be careful, a single fall could spell disaster. And remember, if you do fall... stay PAWsitive!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP (SP3)/Vista/Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 8800GS / ATI Radeon HD 2900 Pro or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
